snippet: In addition to love, food and plans for the future, Natasha Mohammed’s family now has another essential — heat.
abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York, one of the agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, offers $270 to help Natasha Mohammed pay her electric bill.
lead_paragraph: In addition to love, food and plans for the future, Natasha Mohammed’s family now has another essential — heat.

headline.main: Stoking Her Children’s Creative Fires, and Struggling to Stay Warm
headline.print_headline: Stoking Her Children’s Creative Fires, and Struggling to Stay Warm
